name: Use of seclusion, chemical restraint, or mechanical restraint prohibited
text:
[§302A-1141.3]  Use of seclusion, chemical restraint, or mechanical restraint prohibited.  [Section effective August 1, 2016.]  The use of seclusion, chemical restraint, or mechanical restraint shall be prohibited in public schools regardless of any consent of the student, parents, or guardians. [L 2014, c 206, pt of §2]
 
Note
 
  Report to 2018 legislature on department's progress in implementing use of restraint statutes and expenditure of funds.  L 2016, c 151, §1.
